name: Toewr le Fence
description:
[WARNING: THIS GAME IS SOMEWHAT EARLY IN RELEASING AND CONTAINS LOTS OF PROGRAMMER ART, BUT I WILL KEEP THE GAME UPDATING OVER TIME!]

Hello everyone! I'm RMF_AndyPlayz! I am a game developer and has been working on this game for over 3 years! After this 3 years of continuous coding and bug testing, I present to you "Toewr le Fence"

Note that this is my first time in my life doing this. So expect errors pretty much anywhere!

Here's a basic description:
(I'm trying my best to explain without spoiling!)
This is an endless tower defense-themed game where your objective is to survive as long as possible and get the highest score you can get (subject to change. I may add levels later!). In this game, some turrets and threats are replaced with memes (because that's kinda the current trend of gen-z humor).

Target age group: 10-20 years old. (This is the age range where you understand memes, but this game is for you as long as you understand and like 'em!)

Be aware, this is the 1st release. Which means that the game is all "Programmer Art." I am looking forward to polishing up this game in the future!

Anyway, this is a basic rundown because I do not want to spoilers!
